Package net.hudup.core.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActiveMeasure
    ActiveMeasure interface specifies how to measure the active degree of PowerServer.
    ClientStub Deprecated
    Gateway
    For security, each server should implements this interface so that authenticated remote application (client) can retrieves itself and its service.
    PowerServer
    PowerServer is a powerful Server with advanced functions such as supporting balancing and retrieving service.
    Protocol
    Protocol interface specifies methods to create request represented by Request of Hudup client-server network in many possible cases.
    Server
    Server interface defines abstract model of recommendation server.
    ServerStatusListener
    Server represented by Server class has six statuses as follows: "started": Server started.
    Service
    Service interface specifies methods to serve user requests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientUtil
    This utility class provides methods relevant to connection and interaction in client-server architecture.
    ConnectDlg
    This graphic user interface (GUI) component shows a dialog for remote connecting.
    ConnectDlg.ConnectTypeDesc
    This class represent description of a connection type.
    LightRemoteServerCP
    This graphic user interface and a window application JFrame allows users to start, stop, pause, resume, configure Server remotely.
    ProtocolImpl
    This class is the current implementation of Protocol interface.
    ProtocolParam
    This abstract class represents a parameter for Hudup protocol.
    Recommendlet Deprecated
    RemoteServerCP
    This graphic user interface (GUI) as a window application JFrame allows users to start, stop, pause, resume, configure Server remotely.
    Request
    Note, Request class represents user request.
    Response
    Response class represents result of Hudup services such as recommendation task, updating database, information retrieval.
    ServerConfig
    This class represents server configuration.
    ServerInfo
    This class stores essential information about server.
    ServerStatusEvent
    Server represented by Server class has six statuses as follows: "started": Server started.
    ServerTrayIcon
    When server started, there is its icon shown on system tray of current operating system such as Windows and Linux.
    SocketConnection
    This class extends directly SocketWrapper class and so it is also a service that sends request to server and then receives response (result) from server, according to socket interaction.
    SocketWrapper
    This class implements the Service interface according to socket connection in order to send request to server and then receive response (result) from server.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectDlg.ConnectType
    This type represents connection type
    ServerStatusEvent.Status
    This enum defines six status of server represented by Server class.
